item.title: By: Errant Thoughts » Blog Archive » Fake Warcraft Items for Fun and... Well, Not Profit

item.description: [...] Foton over at AFK Gamer pointed the way to a nifty new online toy: the World of Warcraft item and spell creator, on which you can create nifty-looking items and spells and let folks rate them. There are a ton of options–it’s really quite well done–and it’s a lot of fun to play with: [...]

There are a ton of options–it’s really quite well done–and it’s a lot of fun to play with: […]

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description:
I do have to say that browsing the just in items would be much more fun were it not for the sudden run of items having to do with race, sexual organs, and gender-bashing, mostly put up by one or two people.
Gemma, love your stuff!
item.content:encoded:
I do have to say that browsing the just in items would be much more fun were it not for the sudden run of items having to do with race, sexual organs, and gender-bashing, mostly put up by one or two people.

item.title: By: Thoughts from the Void

item.description:
<strong>Fake Warcraft Items for Fun and... Well, Not Profit...</strong>
Foton over at AFK Gamer pointed the way to a nifty new online toy: the World of Warcraft item and spell creator, on which you can create nifty-looking items and spells and let folks rate them. There are a ton of options--it's really quite well done--a...
item.content:encoded:
Fake Warcraft Items for Fun and… Well, Not Profit…

Foton over at AFK Gamer pointed the way to a nifty new online toy: the World of Warcraft item and spell creator, on which you can create nifty-looking items and spells and let folks rate them. There are a ton of options–it’s really quite well done–a…

yes. that one was posted while I was looking for quotes to put on it... damn them... damn them!
